name: Hobble
description: Reduce your speed by 1. Stacks.

name: Disoriented
description: Reduce your vigilance by 1. Stacks.

name: Tripping
description: Immediately lose 4 Action Points.

name: Just A Flesh Wound
description: No further effects other than the injury pool modifier.

name: Falling
description: You are knocked prone. Others within 5 squares have -1 difficulty to hit you, and +1 difficulty if they 10 squares or further away, and you need to spend 2 AP to stand up.

name: Lost It
description: You let your weapon or some other piece of equipment fall - GM's discretion.

name: Dizzy
description: Reduce your action points each round by 1. Stacks.

name: Injured Arm
description: Suffer -1 pool with all checks that use this arm. Stacks.

name: Injured Leg
description: Halve your speed. Stacks.

name: Nausea
description: All actions cost +1 AP. Stacks.

name: Pyrrhic Victory
description: Your next roll gains +3 successes.

name: Concussion
description: Immediately lose 7 Action Points.

name: Distracting Suffering
description: Declare an ally. They suffer a -4 pool penalty on their next check.

name: Gruesome Wound
description: Treating this wound has +2 difficulty.

name: Bleeding
description: Suffer 1 damage (ignoring armor) at the end of each round for 1d6 rounds. Stacks.

name: Crippled Leg
description: You cannot perform free movements any longer, you are permanently prone and your speed becomes 1.

name: Head Injury
description: Increase the difficulty of all checks that involve Intelligence by +1. Stacks.

name: Internal Trauma
description: Every time you perform an action you have roll one single injury die (with no further modifiers).

name: Traumatized
description: If you receive this wound, you can immediately discard it by spending 2 edge points.

name: Brutal Mutilation
description: You suffer a graphic mutilation (like lost fingers or similar) at the GM's discretion. This will description in penalties on social checks (and related checks) until healed.

name: Lost Arm
description: You lose an arm and cannot use it anymore for any actions. Additionally you suffer 1 damage for 1d6 rounds from bleeding.

name: Lost Leg
description: You cannot perform free movements any longer, you are permanently prone and your speed becomes 1. Additionally you suffer 1 damage for 1d6 rounds from bleeding.

name: Blinded
description: All sight-based checks require +2 difficulty. Stacks.

name: Passed Out
description: You become unconscious, but you can attempt a Survival d3 check by spending 5 AP repeatedly to wake up on success.

name: Unconscious
description: You become unconscious for at least one hour or until treated medically.

name: Bleeding Out
description: You become unconscious and will die within 10 rounds, unless treated. To stabilize, another character must succeed with a Medicine d4 check and spend 8 AP. If successful, treat this description as "Unconscious" instead.

name: Instant Death
description: You are dead.
